whats the command to extract a .tar.gz f: apt-cache search java - lists the packages, sudo apt-get install $package_name
will apt-cache search help me looking for other plugins too? like flash? or for some packages?
you can search for anything with it
make sure your hostname matches up in /etc/hosts too
do you mean that i should write the same name in both locations /etc/hostname and /etc/hosts?
no, change the hostname in /etc/hostname, then make sure the entry also matches the hostname in /etc/hsots
ok, it is done, i changed the computer name and i am sure it matches the entry in /etc/hosts. thanks alot
